index.guild_only: I can execute this command only in servers!
index.dm_only: I can execute this command only in private chat with you!
index.restricted: You are not authorized to execute this command!
index.missing_args: You have given the wrong number of arguments!
index.error: There was an error trying to execute that command!

help.help: Lists all commands or information about a specific command.

intro.2: to get information about a specific command!

dm.success: I've sent you a DM with all my commands!
dm.fail_console: Could not send help DM to
dm.fail_reply: It seems like I can't DM you! Do you have DMs disabled?

reload.invalid_command: There is no command with this name or alias
reload.fail: There was an error while reloading the command

lang.help: Without arguments, this command outputs your currently set language. With an argument, this command sets your language to the passing language, if it exists.
lang.error: Error, I could not change your language
